column3: Pending 995b9f385b935e4e9b9fa46e82f642204cc85cba to get merged. Also, I am not a native speaker, so feedback on syntax or content is appreciated.\n

utACK (ut=english looks good but i'm not a lector)

Should we mention the tiny API change in 0.12 when using settxfee and the GUI?

- ban functions (setban / banlist / ban persistence)
- wallet can be used with pruning
- ...

This would require 995b9f3 (part of #7296 and imo a mandatory backport for 0.12)\n

Should priority transactions be in quotes as well? \n

I think this is the "official" term.\n
